description.p: Example demonstrating creating an expanding menu using a ViewBox.

discussion.p: The Menu tree option displays an hierarchical menu. Sub-menus are expanded when the parent menu item is clicked.

description.p: The Menu tree template example is loaded by clicking the Load Sample ViewBox link on the Home tab of the ViewBox Builder. Select *[ui:Menu tree]* from the list of options.
